text: The Shadow Near the Pier () is a 1955Так какое кино мы потеряли? Размышления по поводу готовящейся приватизации Одесской киностудииПрийти однажды, чтобы остаться навсегда... Soviet drama film directed by Mikhail Vinyarsky. Тень у пирса (1955)Шпионские игры на свежем воздухеТВ на будущей неделе == Plot == In one of the seaside cities, a saboteur with a plan of a floating dock, ready for towing to a remote port, was detained. Major of State Security Lyudov has to untangle the ball of connections between the detainee and a group of saboteurs operating in the city and ensure the timely dispatch of the dock. == Cast== * Oleg Zhakov as Major LyudovЛучшие годы нашей жизни. Воспоминания о занятиях в режиссёрской мастерской Сергея Эйзенштейна * Raisa Matyushkina as Tatyana Rakitina * Oleg Tumanov as Sergey Ageyev * Ekaterina Savinova as waitress Klava Shubina * Vladimir Balashov as Kobchikov * Viktor Kulakov as SemyonТень у пирса (1955) Full Cast & Crew * Lev Olevsky as Colonel Rysley == Release == In list of highest-grossing films of the USSR, film of Mikhail Vinyarsky takes 400th place with 29.4 million spectators.СССР: Самые кассовые фильмы == References == == External links == * Category:1955 films Category:Soviet films Category:Russian-language films Category:1950s spy drama films Category:Odessa Film Studio films Category:Soviet spy drama films
title: The Shadow Near the Pier
